channel.title: How do i add items to a shop?

item.title: How do i add items to a shop?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

If you use spaces in a configuration file, you will get errors, you need to use tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add items to a shop?
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

tajkillerscape:

why not spaces?..plus how do i edit how much they sell for.

spaces sometimes mess up, and i think its in item.java

and do you ever take a break? you’ve been on the forums since i logged out last night, and were on when i got home from school today lol.

item.title: How do i add items to a shop?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“tajkillerscape, post:6, topic:240076”]why not spaces?..plus how do i edit how much they sell for.[/quote]look at the top of the page… it tells you the pattern like i said.

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount

it reads cfg files through tab, not space. idk.

And the price is in the item.java

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add items to a shop?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“tajkillerscape, post:3, topic:240076”]ok look i did that but when i tryed to run the server it just says exception in thread “main” java.lan.number etc.[/quote]Then you didn’t follow the pattern. you messed up somewhere. make sure you’re using tabs to space, instead of space to space.
